snippet.title: Damaged In Transit - Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming Soon to Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/damaged-in-transit-switch/
Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1063120/Damaged_In_Transit/
Get it on Itch.io: https://kroftee.itch.io/damagedintransit
Check out our website: https://www.kroftee.com/damagedintransit 
Check out our presskit: https://www.kroftee.com/damagedintransit/presskit

Split your attention in Damaged In Transit! 

This mind-bending action-puzzler will leave you cross-eyed! Juggle your two drones and help them deliver their precious cargo. Spikes, pitfalls, flamethrowers and enemy robots will threaten your shipment as you trek across 125 levels of desert oases, coal mines, ports, oil rigs, and the core of the Earth!!! Deftly manage the map and use the items you find to open pathways and keep the drones safe. Embrace the miracle of automated delivery!

Features:

* Single Player - Juggle both drones by yourself.
* Local Co-Op - Juggle both drones with a friend! Each player takes half the controls.
* 125 levels over 5 Worlds
* Spikes!
* Lava!
*Traps!
* Spikes!
* Evil Robots!
* More Spikes!

Made by Wyatt Yeong (@kroftee), Diego Garcia (@radstronomical), and Greg Heffernan (@cosmoddd)
